ComicInfo.Title: Crazy, Daddy, Crazy; Who-Dunnit?; Gold Galore; Hassle in a Castle
ComicInfo.Summary:
Crazy, Daddy, Crazy: Little Angela and her friends are driving her father crazy.
Who-Dunnit?: The identity of the people trying to steal Uncle Wesley's gold are revealed.
Gold Galore: The chipmunks are convinced that Uncle Wesley's friends Laughing Horse and Parson Peebles are the ones trying to steal Uncle Wesley's gold.
Hassle in a Castle: Someone is trying to steal Uncle Wesley's money.
